refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: ag-backup is a simple tool to backup the accounts database.

refsect1.title: Invocation
refsect1.para: ag-backup accepts a single argument, to show usage notes. On execution with no arguments, it will backup the accounts database from XDG_CONFIG_HOME/libaccounts-glib/accounts.db to XDG_CONFIG_HOME/libaccounts-glib/accounts.db.bak.
